thread.title: Apple iCloud move in China raises human rights fears

title: Apple iCloud move in China raises human rights fears
text:
Apple iCloud move in China raises human rights fears 12:19pm GMT - 01:15 
When Apple begins hosting Chinese users’ iCloud accounts in a new Chinese data centre at the end of this month to comply with new laws there, Chinese authorities will have far easier access to text messages, email and other data stored in the cloud. Grace Lee reports
